title: Ham and wild rice quiche
ingredients: ['180ml water', '4 tablespoons uncooked wild rice', '1 (23cm) unbaked pastry case', '120g cubed cooked ham', '5 tablespoons finely chopped red pepper', '4 tablespoons thinly sliced spring onion tops', '1/2 (300g) tin mushrooms, drained and sliced', '3 eggs, beaten', '250ml soured cream', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon black pepper', '500g grated Gruyere cheese']
